channel.title: Programming Languages on hack(pravj)

item.title: Swift - First Impressions
item.description: Last week at WWDC Apple made the most exciting announcement (for developers at least) of launching a new programming language - Swift. Although I have never written a single line of code for iOS (in Objective C) I got so excited that within no time I was installing Xcode 6 to give playground & Swift a shot. After spending a week with Swift I’ve come to the conclusion that it is a very well designed programming language.
